import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion, useScroll, useTransform } from 'framer-motion'; import { FaExclamationTriangle, FaChartLine, FaGraduationCap, FaShieldAlt, FaArrowDown, FaTimes, FaBars } from 'react-icons/fa'; import './Home.css'; const Home = () => { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const { scrollYProgress } = useScroll(); const opacity = useTransform(scrollYProgress, [0, 0.1], [1, 0]); const scale = useTransform(scrollYProgress, [0, 0.1], [1, 0.8]); const scrollToSection = (sectionId) => { const element = document.getElementById(sectionId); if (element) { element.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); } setIsMenuOpen(false); }; const fadeInUp = { initial: { opacity: 0, y: 60 }, animate: { opacity: 1, y: 0 }, transition: { duration: 0.6 } }; const staggerContainer = { animate: { transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }; return (

{/* Hero Section */}
Critical Warning

The Harsh Reality of Trading

99% of retail traders fail. Here's why you shouldn't be one of them.

{/* Statistics Section */}
The Numbers Don't Lie
99%
Failure Rate
Of retail traders lose money consistently
80%
Lose Money
Within the first year of trading
6.5%
Underperformance
Annual underperformance vs buy & hold
95%
Quit Within 2 Years
Most traders abandon their strategy
{/* Why Traders Fail Section */}
Why Most Traders Fail

Poor Risk Management

No stop-losses, over-leveraging, and lack of diversification lead to catastrophic losses.

Emotional Trading

Fear, greed, and overconfidence drive decisions instead of rational analysis.

Insufficient Knowledge

Lack of understanding of market mechanics and proper analysis techniques.

Systemic Disadvantages

Competing against institutions with better tools, data, and resources.
{/* Warning Section */}

Critical Warning

Trading is not a path to quick wealth. You're competing against:

  • Professional traders with advanced algorithms
  • Institutional investors with billions in capital
  • High-frequency trading firms
  • Market makers who control liquidity

The odds are fundamentally stacked against you.

{/* Alternatives Section */}
Better Alternatives

Index Investing

Low-cost, diversified exposure to broad market performance with proven long-term returns.

Dollar-Cost Averaging

Regular investments over time reduce timing risk and emotional decision-making.

Education & Skills

Invest in yourself through education and skill development for better career opportunities.

Emergency Fund

Build financial security with 3-6 months of expenses in liquid savings.
{/* Footer */}

© 2024 NoHolyGrail. Educational content only. Not financial advice.
